definitions.definition: The act of storing goods; the state of being stored.
definitions.example: There's a lot of storage space in the loft.

definitions.definition: (usually countable) An object or place in which something is stored.
(usually uncountable) Any computer device, including such as a disk, on which data is stored for a longer term than memory.
definitions.example: I′d recommend backing up these files to storage before reinstalling the operating system.

definitions.definition: The price charged for storing goods.
To put into storage; to store.
